description:
The Asakura Clan commanders, Yamazaki and Makara face off with Hideyoshi’s forces of 3,000 men with an army of 20,000. Part of the Hideyoshi forces stay behind at Kanegasaki Castle in order to slow them even more. The Asakura Clan immediately begin their attack, but Hanbee’s plan was already in effect.
Source: crunchyroll
